short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically plays sign videos for words on the NZSL Dictionary sign definition pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you use the New Zealand Sign Language (NZSL) Dictionary website to learn NZSL signs for specific words?
Are you tired of manually clicking "play" for the sign video on a www.nzsl.nz word definition page? 
This extension will do it for you! 
You will be able to navigate to any sign page on the New Zealand Sign Language (NZSL) Dictionary website and the sign definition video will play automatically! 

This extension will only operate on sign definition pages and search results pages on the NZSL Dictionary website at www.nzsl.nz.
